American_Diabetes.title: Grilled Chicken with Roasted Veggies
American_Diabetes.instructions: Marinate chicken with olive oil and herbs. Grill until fully cooked. Roast bell peppers and zucchini. Serve hot.

American_Gluten_free.title: Quinoa Salad with Grilled Chicken
American_Gluten_free.instructions: Cook quinoa. Grill chicken. Toss with spinach, cherry tomatoes, and lemon dressing.

American_Halal.title: Halal Beef Steak with Garlic Butter
American_Halal.instructions: Season beef with salt and pepper. Grill with garlic butter. Serve hot.

American_Keto.title: Keto Avocado Chicken Salad
American_Keto.instructions: Mix chopped chicken, avocado, spinach, and olive oil with lemon juice.

American_Kosher.title: Kosher Honey Glazed Salmon
American_Kosher.instructions: Marinate salmon with honey, soy sauce, and garlic. Bake until golden.

American_Lactose_Intolerance.title: Dairy-Free Chicken Stir Fry
American_Lactose_Intolerance.instructions: Sauté chicken, broccoli, and garlic in soy sauce and sesame oil.

American_Paleo.title: Paleo Sweet Potato & Beef Hash
American_Paleo.instructions: Cook beef with onions, garlic, and paprika. Add roasted sweet potatoes.

American_Vegan.title: Vegan Black Bean Burger
American_Vegan.instructions: Mash black beans and mushrooms. Mix with oats, form patties, and grill.

American_Vegetarian.title: Vegetarian Stuffed Bell Peppers
American_Vegetarian.instructions: Stuff bell peppers with quinoa and sautéed vegetables. Bake until tender.

American_None.title: Classic American Cheeseburger
American_None.instructions: Grill beef patty, top with cheese, serve on bun with lettuce and tomato.

Chinese_Diabetes.title: Steamed Fish with Ginger & Soy Sauce
Chinese_Diabetes.instructions: Steam fish with ginger and soy sauce. Garnish with scallions.

Chinese_Gluten_free.title: Gluten-Free Chicken & Broccoli Stir Fry
Chinese_Gluten_free.instructions: Stir-fry chicken and broccoli with garlic and gluten-free soy sauce.

Chinese_Halal.title: Halal Beef & Green Beans
Chinese_Halal.instructions: Sauté beef with garlic, ginger, and soy sauce. Add green beans.

Chinese_Keto.title: Keto-Friendly Beef Stir Fry
Chinese_Keto.instructions: Sauté beef in sesame oil, add garlic and broccoli, stir-fry with soy sauce.

Chinese_Vegan.title: Tofu & Bok Choy Stir Fry
Chinese_Vegan.instructions: Sauté garlic and ginger, add tofu and bok choy, stir-fry until tender.

Chinese_Lactose_Intolerance.title: Dairy-Free Mapo Tofu
Chinese_Lactose_Intolerance.instructions: Cube tofu, sauté with garlic, soy sauce, and chili paste. Serve over rice.

Chinese_Paleo.title: Paleo Chicken & Cashew Stir Fry
Chinese_Paleo.instructions: Sauté chicken, cashews, and broccoli with garlic in coconut aminos.

Chinese_Vegan_2.title: Vegan Stir-Fried Eggplant
Chinese_Vegan_2.instructions: Slice eggplant, sauté with garlic, ginger, and soy sauce until tender.

Chinese_Vegetarian.title: Vegetarian Bok Choy & Mushroom Stir Fry
Chinese_Vegetarian.instructions: Sauté bok choy and mushrooms with garlic and soy sauce. Garnish with sesame seeds.

Chinese_None.title: Classic Chinese Kung Pao Chicken
Chinese_None.instructions: Stir-fry chicken with peanuts, garlic, and soy sauce. Add chili peppers for spice.

French_Diabetes.title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter Sauce
French_Diabetes.instructions: Season salmon and grill until cooked. Melt butter with lemon and garlic, drizzle over salmon. Serve hot.

French_Gluten_free.title: Gluten-Free Ratatouille
French_Gluten_free.instructions: Slice vegetables, layer in a dish, bake with olive oil and tomato sauce.

French_Halal.title: Halal Coq au Vin
French_Halal.instructions: Sauté chicken with mushrooms, garlic, and tomato paste. Slow-cook with carrots until tender.

French_Keto.title: Keto Cheese Omelette
French_Keto.instructions: Beat eggs, cook in butter, add cheese and spinach, fold omelette and serve hot.

French_Kosher.title: Kosher Herb-Crusted Fish
French_Kosher.instructions: Season fish with herbs and garlic, bake until flaky. Serve with a drizzle of lemon juice.

French_Lactose_Intolerance.title: Dairy-Free French Onion Soup
French_Lactose_Intolerance.instructions: Caramelize onions, simmer in vegetable broth, serve with toasted French bread.

French_Paleo.title: Paleo Grilled Steak with Vegetables
French_Paleo.instructions: Season steak and grill, roast zucchini and tomatoes, serve together.

French_Vegan.title: Vegan Ratatouille
French_Vegan.instructions: Slice vegetables, layer in a dish, bake with garlic and olive oil until tender.

French_Vegetarian.title: Vegetarian Quiche with Spinach
French_Vegetarian.instructions: Whisk eggs, mix with sautéed spinach and cheese, bake in whole wheat crust.

French_None.title: Classic French Beef Bourguignon
French_None.instructions: Brown beef with onions, garlic, and tomato paste, slow-cook with carrots until tender.

Indian_Diabetes.title: Masoor Dal with Stir-Fried Vegetables
Indian_Diabetes.instructions: Boil lentils with turmeric and ghee. Stir-fry carrots and spinach. Serve hot with dal.

Indian_Gluten_free.title: Gluten-Free Roti with Vegetable Curry
Indian_Gluten_free.instructions: Prepare gluten-free roti, cook vegetables in a curry sauce, serve together.

Indian_Halal.title: Halal Chicken Biryani
Indian_Halal.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook with rice and caramelized onions.

Indian_Keto.title: Paneer Tikka (Keto-Friendly)
Indian_Keto.instructions: Marinate paneer in yogurt and spices. Grill with bell peppers and serve with lemon.

Indian_Kosher.title: Kosher Dal Tadka
Indian_Kosher.instructions: Cook lentils, temper with garlic and spices, serve hot.

Indian_Lactose_Intolerance.title: Dairy-Free Vegetable Korma
Indian_Lactose_Intolerance.instructions: Blend cashews and coconut milk for sauce, cook with vegetables and spices.

Indian_Paleo.title: Paleo Lamb Curry
Indian_Paleo.instructions: Slow-cook lamb with tomatoes, garlic, and spices in coconut oil.

Indian_Vegan.title: Vegan Chana Masala
Indian_Vegan.instructions: Cook chickpeas in tomato sauce with onions, garlic, and spices. Serve hot.

Indian_Vegetarian.title: Vegetarian Baingan Bharta
Indian_Vegetarian.instructions: Roast eggplant, mash with tomatoes and spices, cook until tender.

Indian_None.title: Classic Indian Butter Chicken
Indian_None.instructions: Cook chicken in tomato-based sauce with cream and spices, serve hot.

Italian_Diabetes.title: Grilled Salmon with Pesto
Italian_Diabetes.instructions: Grill salmon, blend basil with garlic and olive oil for pesto, serve together.

Italian_Gluten_free.title: Gluten-Free Zucchini Pasta
Italian_Gluten_free.instructions: Sauté zucchini noodles with tomato sauce, garlic, and olive oil. Sprinkle Parmesan before serving.

Italian_Halal.title: Halal Chicken Parmesan
Italian_Halal.instructions: Coat chicken in tomato sauce, top with mozzarella, bake until golden, garnish with basil.

Italian_Keto.title: Keto Italian Meatballs
Italian_Keto.instructions: Mix beef, eggs, Parmesan, and garlic. Shape into meatballs, bake, and serve with tomato paste.

Italian_Kosher.title: Kosher Baked Eggplant Parmesan
Italian_Kosher.instructions: Layer eggplant slices with tomato sauce and mozzarella, bake until golden.

Italian_Lactose_Intolerance.title: Dairy-Free Italian Mushroom Risotto
Italian_Lactose_Intolerance.instructions: Sauté mushrooms and garlic, gradually add vegetable broth while cooking Arborio rice.

Italian_Paleo.title: Paleo Italian Stuffed Peppers
Italian_Paleo.instructions: Stuff bell peppers with seasoned ground turkey and tomatoes, bake until tender.

Italian_Vegan.title: Vegan Tomato & Basil Pasta
Italian_Vegan.instructions: Cook pasta, sauté garlic and tomatoes, toss with basil and olive oil, serve hot.

Italian_Vegetarian.title: Vegetarian Italian Minestrone Soup
Italian_Vegetarian.instructions: Simmer vegetables and beans in vegetable broth until fully cooked.

Italian_None.title: Classic Italian Spaghetti Carbonara
Italian_None.instructions: Cook spaghetti, mix with eggs and Parmesan, toss with crispy bacon, season with black pepper.

Japanese_Diabetes.title: Grilled Miso Salmon
Japanese_Diabetes.instructions: Marinate salmon in miso paste, soy sauce, and ginger. Grill until fully cooked. Garnish with sesame seeds and serve.

Japanese_Gluten_free.title: Gluten-Free Sushi Bowl
Japanese_Gluten_free.instructions: Cook sushi rice, slice salmon and avocado, mix with cucumber, drizzle tamari over the bowl.

Japanese_Halal.title: Halal Chicken Teriyaki
Japanese_Halal.instructions: Sauté chicken with garlic and ginger, add soy sauce and brown sugar. Simmer until thickened.

Japanese_Keto.title: Keto Japanese Egg Drop Soup
Japanese_Keto.instructions: Boil broth, whisk in eggs gently, add ginger and green onions. Drizzle sesame oil before serving.

Japanese_Kosher.title: Kosher Miso Soup
Japanese_Kosher.instructions: Boil water, dissolve miso paste, add tofu and seaweed, garnish with green onions and sesame seeds.

Japanese_Lactose_Intolerance.title: Dairy-Free Japanese Stir Fry
Japanese_Lactose_Intolerance.instructions: Sauté chicken with garlic, add bok choy and soy sauce, cook until tender.

Japanese_Paleo.title: Paleo Japanese Beef & Broccoli
Japanese_Paleo.instructions: Sauté beef with garlic, add broccoli and coconut aminos, serve hot.

Japanese_Vegan.title: Vegan Miso Noodle Soup
Japanese_Vegan.instructions: Boil water, dissolve miso paste, cook noodles, add mushrooms and tofu, serve warm.

Japanese_Vegetarian.title: Vegetarian Japanese Curry
Japanese_Vegetarian.instructions: Sauté onions, carrots, and potatoes with curry paste, simmer until thick. Serve with rice.

Japanese_None.title: Classic Japanese Ramen
Japanese_None.instructions: Boil ramen noodles, prepare chicken broth, add boiled egg and green onions.

Mexican_Diabetes.title: Grilled Chicken Fajitas
Mexican_Diabetes.instructions: Slice chicken and vegetables, sauté with olive oil and cumin, serve in lettuce wraps.

Mexican_Gluten_free.title: Gluten-Free Tacos
Mexican_Gluten_free.instructions: Cook beef, assemble tacos with tomatoes, lettuce, and cheese in corn tortillas.

Mexican_Halal.title: Halal Chicken Enchiladas
Mexican_Halal.instructions: Shred chicken, mix with spices, wrap in tortillas, top with tomato sauce and cheese, bake.

Mexican_Keto.title: Keto Avocado Chicken Salad
Mexican_Keto.instructions: Mix chopped chicken, avocado, spinach, and olive oil with lime juice.

Mexican_Kosher.title: Kosher Beef Tostadas
Mexican_Kosher.instructions: Cook beef, mash beans, assemble tostadas with tomatoes and lettuce.

Mexican_Lactose_Intolerance.title: Dairy-Free Mexican Rice Bowl
Mexican_Lactose_Intolerance.instructions: Cook rice, mix with beans, tomatoes, and onions, top with avocado slices.

Mexican_Paleo.title: Paleo Beef & Peppers
Mexican_Paleo.instructions: Sauté beef with garlic and olive oil, add bell peppers, squeeze lime juice before serving.

Mexican_Vegan.title: Vegan Black Bean Chili
Mexican_Vegan.instructions: Cook beans, blend with tomatoes, onions, and garlic, simmer until thick.

Mexican_Vegetarian.title: Vegetarian Stuffed Peppers
Mexican_Vegetarian.instructions: Stuff bell peppers with quinoa and beans, bake until soft, drizzle with olive oil.

Mexican_None.title: Classic Beef Burritos
Mexican_None.instructions: Cook beef and rice, assemble burritos with beans and cheese, grill lightly.

Turkish_Diabetes.title: Grilled Lamb with Roasted Vegetables
Turkish_Diabetes.instructions: Marinate lamb in olive oil and garlic, grill until tender. Roast vegetables and serve together.

Turkish_Gluten_free.title: Gluten-Free Turkish Lentil Soup
Turkish_Gluten_free.instructions: Cook lentils with carrots, onions, and garlic in olive oil, blend until smooth.

Turkish_Halal.title: Halal Turkish Kebabs
Turkish_Halal.instructions: Marinate beef in yogurt and spices, grill on skewers, serve hot.

Turkish_Keto.title: Keto Turkish Eggplant Casserole
Turkish_Keto.instructions: Layer eggplant with seasoned beef and tomato sauce, bake until tender.

Turkish_Kosher.title: Kosher Turkish Chickpea Stew
Turkish_Kosher.instructions: Cook chickpeas with tomatoes and garlic in olive oil, season with Turkish spices.

Turkish_Lactose_Intolerance.title: Dairy-Free Turkish Stuffed Peppers
Turkish_Lactose_Intolerance.instructions: Stuff bell peppers with seasoned rice and tomatoes, bake until soft.

Turkish_Paleo.title: Paleo Turkish Grilled Fish
Turkish_Paleo.instructions: Season fish with garlic and spices, grill until flaky, squeeze lemon before serving.

Turkish_Vegan.title: Vegan Turkish Lentil Patties
Turkish_Vegan.instructions: Mash lentils, mix with onions, garlic, and spices, shape into patties and bake.

Turkish_Vegetarian.title: Vegetarian Turkish Bean Salad
Turkish_Vegetarian.instructions: Mix beans with chopped vegetables, drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.

Turkish_None.title: Classic Turkish Pide
Turkish_None.instructions: Prepare dough, fill with seasoned beef and cheese, bake until golden.

Thai_Diabetes.title: Grilled Thai Chicken with Spicy Lime Dressing
Thai_Diabetes.instructions: Marinate chicken with lime juice, garlic, and Thai chili. Grill until cooked. Serve with spicy lime dressing.

Thai_Gluten_free.title: Gluten-Free Thai Stir-Fried Vegetables
Thai_Gluten_free.instructions: Sauté vegetables with garlic and gluten-free soy sauce, finish with sesame oil.

Thai_Halal.title: Halal Thai Red Curry Chicken
Thai_Halal.instructions: Cook chicken in coconut milk and curry paste, add basil and garlic, simmer until thick.

Thai_Keto.title: Keto Thai Chicken Coconut Soup
Thai_Keto.instructions: Boil chicken in coconut milk, add lime, lemongrass, and Thai chili, simmer until flavored.

Thai_Kosher.title: Kosher Thai Basil Beef
Thai_Kosher.instructions: Cook beef with garlic, soy sauce, and Thai basil, serve hot.

Thai_Lactose_Intolerance.title: Dairy-Free Thai Green Curry
Thai_Lactose_Intolerance.instructions: Cook vegetables in coconut milk and curry paste, add garlic and ginger, simmer until thick.

Thai_Paleo.title: Paleo Thai Grilled Fish
Thai_Paleo.instructions: Season fish with Thai spices and garlic, grill until flaky, serve with lemongrass sauce.

Thai_Vegan.title: Vegan Thai Peanut Noodles
Thai_Vegan.instructions: Cook noodles, toss with peanut sauce, add tofu and carrots, garnish with cilantro.

Thai_Vegetarian.title: Vegetarian Thai Pad See Ew
Thai_Vegetarian.instructions: Cook noodles, scramble eggs, add soy sauce and garlic, mix with broccoli and serve.

Thai_None.title: Classic Thai Pad Thai
Thai_None.instructions: Cook noodles, scramble eggs, sauté shrimp, mix with peanuts and soy sauce.
